# S-R data
S-R data type consists of **Brood Year**, Spawner (Escapement) size and  Recruit (Brood year return) size.    

| Year  | | Spawner|| Recruit| 
|-------:|---:|-------:|---:|-------:|
|____|_|______|_|______|
| 1966 |  | 1000|   | 2500   |
| 1967|   | 1200|   | 7300   |
| 1968 |  | 2500 |  | 4250   |
| 1969|   | 3500|   | 5250   |
| 1970|   |  900|   | 3280   |
| 1971|   | 1500|   | 14250 |
| 1972|   | 500|    | 2500  |
| 1973|   | 4500|   | 2250  |
|____|_|______|_|______|
---

**S-R data with measurement error**
When measurement error associated with Spawner (escapement) is available, calculate CV and name as  **CV_E** as 

| Year  | | Spawner|| Recruit|| CV_E| 
|-------:|---:|-------:|---:|-------:|---:|-------:|
|____|_|______|_|______|
| 1966 |  | 1000|   | 2500   | | 0.25   |
| 1967|   | 1200|   | 7300   | | 0.21   |
| 1968 |  | 2500 |  | 4250   | | 0.15   |
| 1969|   | 3500|   | 5250   | | 0.53   |
| 1970|   |  900|   | 3280   | | 0.10   |
| 1971|   | 1500|   | 14250 | | 0.23   |
| 1972|   | 500|    | 2500  | | 0.05   |
| 1973|   | 4500|   | 2250  | | 0.25   |
|____|_|______|_|______|_|______|
---



Analyses methods available for this data type are: 
* SR Analyses and Escapement Goal Analyses 


# Escapement Only data 
Escapement only data type consists of **Calendar Year** and Spawner (Escapement) size. Only Percentile and Risk Analyses are available for this data type.  Please see Escapement Only Data Analyses section for more information.     

| Year  | | Escapement| 
|-------:|---:|-------:|
| 1966|   | 1000   |
| 1967|   | 1200   |
| 1968|   | 2500   |
| 1969|   | 3500   | 
| 1970|   | 2400 |   
| 1971|   | 1500|  
| 1972|   | 500|   
| 1973|   | 4500|  
|____|_|______|
